You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if the weapons you are wielding aren't Light and you can equip two weapons for free on your turn instead of one. You cannot dual-wield <LSTag Tooltip="Heavy">Heavy</LSTag> weapons.
Prevents casting spells that require <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag> while concentrating on another spell.
Stabilized
Commanded
A stabilized character no longer has to roll Death Saving Throws and will regain [1] after leaving combat.
This summon can act because its Owner commanded it.

If you reach 0 hit points, you fall Unconscious and must make Death Saving Throws. On 3 successes, you stop bleeding out and become Stable. On 3 failures, you die.
If you regain any Hit Points, the condition is removed. If an ally <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Help">Helps</LSTag> you and succeeds on their DC 10 <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Check</LSTag>, you become stabilized and regain [1] when Out of Combat.
Command Summon
Makes a DC 10 <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Check</LSTag> to stabilize a <LSTag Tooltip="Downed">Downed</LSTag> character.
Use your Bonus Action to command your summon to act.
Removes Burning, Ensnared, Entangled, Enwebbed, Prone, and Sleeping.
